summary: When entering the map menu, it will display which hold you are currently in.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]What it does[/b][/u]
Just a small mod I thought of recently, usually when I am playing the game I'm curious to know what hold I'm in. All this does is display on the upper left hand corner of the map menu, the current hold you are in.

It's come to my attention that this mod is somewhat similar to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35718/?]Border Sense[/url]. In order to keep this mod a bit different from his own, my mod works entirely in the map menu. Does not have an MCM menu, and doesn't check for holds the player is approaching.  I also did not correct the locations that had the wrong holds, however, I use an array system to check for these locations and display a message of the correct hold they should be apart of. Theoretically, our mods should be compatible with each other, since I did not edit the locations forms, cells or anything of the sort.

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4][b]
[/b][b]Requires the lastest Skyrim Patch.[/b]
[b]Requires SKSE 1.5 or later.[/b][/size][/color]


[u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u]
Should play well with all. It just adds a message to the screen when you go in the map menu. The map and the menu itself is not edited by this mod at all.

[u][b]Installation[/b][/u]
Install with your desired mod organizer. If you wish to install manually, just drap and drop the data folder into your root skyrim directory, and click ok on any prompts for overwrite.

[u][b]Known Issues[/b][/u]
There are a number of Cells in the game that does not have a location assigned to it. So the message will not appear for those areas.

However even in a location that is part of a hold, the message sometimes may not appear, just re-open the map menu and it should appear.
[b][u]
Uninstall[/u][/b]
Remove the following files:
Scripts\DisplayHoldLocationRefScript.pex
Scripts\QF_DisplayHoldLocationUpdate_020012CF.pex
Scripts\Source\DisplayHoldLocationRefScript.psc
Scripts\Source\QF_DisplayHoldLocationUpdate_020012CF.psc
Data\Display Hold Locations.esp

Any "left overs" you can remove with a save cleaner.

[b][u]Change Log[/u][/b]
1.0: Initial release
1.0.1: Several locations in the game are placed in the wrong Hold locations. The following will display correct holds:
[list][*][size=2]HillgrundsTombLocation => PaleHoldLocation → Whiterun Hold[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=2]SnaplegCaveLocation => EastmarchHoldLocation → Rift Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]DarkShadeCorpseLocation => FalkreathHoldLocation → Eastmarch Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Secunda's Kiss => FalkreathHoldLocation(not assigned a location?)→ Whiterun Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]BleakFallsBarrowLocation => FalkreathHoldLocation → Whiterun Hold
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]PinePeakCavern => RiftHoldLocation → Whiterun Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]DustmansCairnLocation, Exterior01 => ReachHoldLocation → Whiterun Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]TalkingStoneCampLocation => HjaalmarchHoldLocation → Whiterun Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]GjukarsMonumentLocation == WhiterunHoldLocation (this one didn't have a location at all.)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]SerpentsBluffRedoubtLocation => WhiterunHold → TheReach[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]DeepwoodRedoubtLocation => ReachHoldLocation → Haarfingar Hold
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]MorKhazgarLocation => ReachHoldLocation → Haarfingar Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]HagsEndLocation => ReachHoldLocation → Haarfingar Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]LostEchoCaveLocation => FalkreathHoldLocation → Haarfingar Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]RannveigsFastLocation, Exterior01-03 => WhiterunHoldLocation → Hjaalmarch Hold
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]ColdRockPassLocation, Exterior01-02 => WhiterunHoldLocation → Hjaalmarch Hold
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]DrelasCottageLocation, DrelasCottage => WhiterunHoldLocation → Hjaalmarch Hold
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]HighGateRuinsLocation, Exterior => Pale → Hjaalmarch Hold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]FellglowKeepLocation, Exterior01-02 => WhiterunHoldLocation → Pale[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]StoneHillBluff => WhiterunHoldLocation → Pale[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]UtteringHillsCampLocation => EastmarchHold → Pale[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]MzinchaleftLocation => Hjaalmarch → Pale[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]DuskglowCrevice => Pale → WinterHold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]IronbinBarrowLocation => TamrielLocation → WinterHold[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Added an update quest to stop the quest of the previous version and start it back up. Just incase the mod stop working for saves that have already ran the OnInit event.
[/size]
[/*]
[/list]Credits: Beth for great tool and papyrus.
SKSE team for making this mod possible with their great functions.

My other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56452/?]Disarm Retrievel[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60373]Escape[/url] (First mod from a year ago, re-released.)
author: Terra Nova
